prompts: Create a powerful Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, featuring a robust design.
Imagine a rock-type Pokemon with metallic armor and an intimidating stance.
Generate an imposing creature that combines elements of steel and rock for its unique appearance.
Design a gigantic Pokemon that towers over others, showcasing its rugged features.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, reflecting its tough nature.
Give me a Pokemon with a mix of gray and silver colors, emphasizing its armored body.
Make a Pokemon that excels in defensive combat, highlighting its sturdy build and protective traits.
